meanings.definition: A group of peptides that stimulate growth in cells
meanings.sent1: The somatomedins help cells grow bigger and stronger.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study somatomedins to understand how cells grow.
meanings.sent3: The somatomedins threw a party for the cells to grow together.
meanings.sent4: Like magic potions, somatomedins make cells grow like never before.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of cells, somatomedins are the fertilizer for growth.

meanings.definition: Hormones that promote growth in the body
meanings.sent1: My body needs somatomedins to grow taller.
meanings.sent2: Athletes have high levels of somatomedins for muscle growth.
meanings.sent3: The somatomedins in my body decided to throw a growth party.
meanings.sent4: Somatomedins act like cheerleaders, encouraging growth in the body.
meanings.sent5: In the race of growth, somatomedins give my body a head start.
